title: Swing away
creator_credit: Castle Films, United World Films and Max Glandbard
brief_description: Golfer Tommy Armour demonstrates the importance of coordinated balance, rhythm, and timing in the backswing and the downswing. Shows the advantage of the closed stance for the drive and other long wood shots and of the square stance for long iron shots. Discusses the specific uses of various golf clubs. Includes demonstrations in slow motion photography.
